UniprotID	P06401-3
Accession	P06401;A7LQ08;A7X8B0;B4E3T0;Q8TDS3;Q9UPF7
EntryName	PRGR_HUMAN
ProteinName	Progesterone receptor (PR) (Nuclear receptor subfamily 3 group C member 3)
GeneName	PGR NR3C3
Length	339
Function	The steroid hormones and their receptors are involved in the regulation of eukaryotic gene expression and affect cellular proliferation and differentiation in target tissues. Depending on the isoform, progesterone receptor functions as a transcriptional activator or repressor.
